document.docAuthor: Shih, Hsi-Te, Ng, Peter K. L., Fang, Shou-Hua, Chan, Benny K. K. & Wong, Kingsley J. H.
document.masterDocTitle: Diversity and distribution of fiddler crabs (Brachyura: Ocypodidae: Uca) from China, with new records from Hainan Island in the South China Sea

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Diversity and distribution of fiddler crabs (Brachyura: Ocypodidae: Uca) from China, with new records from Hainan Island in the South China Sea

subSubSection.paragraph:
Ocypode
(
Gelasimus
))
arcuata De Haan, 1835 : 53
, pl. 7 , fig. 2 [ type locality Japan ].

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Gelasimus brevipes H.
Milne Edwards, 1852
: 146
, pl. 3 ( 7 ) [ type locality China ];
Stimpson 1907
: 106
[list].

Uca forcipata
(not
Gelasimus forcipatus
Adams & White, 1848
)—
Rathbun 1931
: 101
[Wenzhou; Sandu; Guantou; Meihua; Fuzhou; Liuwudian; specimens examined by
Crane ( 1975 : 594 )
].

Uca ( Deltuca ) arcuata
—
Crane 1975
: 44
, pls. 5 A–F, figs. 8 C, 9 C, 61 J;
Dai et al. 1986
: 420
, pl. 58 ( 5 ), fig. 232 [Shandong; Zhejiang; Fujian; Guangdong];
Dai & Yang 1991
: 460
, pl. 58 ( 5 ), fig. 232 [Shandong; Zhejiang; Fujian; Guangdong];
Lu 1996
: 165
[Xiamen, Fujian];
Lai & He 1998
: 172
[Guangxi];
Liang et al. 2005
: 22
[Leizhou, Guangdong].

Uca acuta
(not
Gelasimus acutus
Stimpson, 1858
)—
Kwok & Tang 2006
: 4
, fig. 2 [ Hong Kong ].
